spec.description: NTUA's LAB in Lambda Flow. Big Data, Database theory
spec.name: dbLab

charts.name: Name this Cell
charts.note:
Measurement from a demo Real-time processing system
with data from IoT devices.  
Measurement types: Temperature (°C), Pressure (PSI), Power (Watt)

queries.query:
from(bucket: "streaming_iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggregated_measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_type"] == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "streaming_iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggregated_measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_type"] == "temperature")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

from(bucket: "streaming_iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggregated_measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_type"] == "pressure")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

charts.name: Total power generation for the Last Hour

queries.query:
from(bucket: "streaming_iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggregated_measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_type"] == "power")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: sum, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "sum")

charts.name: Average pressure for the Last Hour

queries.query:
from(bucket: "streaming_iot")

  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggregated_measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_type"] == "pressure")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: 1h, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "mean")

charts.name: Average temperature for the Last Hour

queries.query:
from(bucket: "streaming_iot")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "aggregated_measurement")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "value")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["measurement_type"] == "temperature")
